mapper.select: SELECT membership, m.userId, userName, pwd, reg_date, modify_date, point FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} AND enable != 0
mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO member1(userId, userName, pwd, enable, reg_date, modify_date, point) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{pwd}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0) INTO member2(userId, birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, gender, genre) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{gender}, #{genre}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT m.userId, membership, userName, pwd, enable, reg_date, modify_date, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, point, gender, genre, introducer FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m.userId = m1.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET membership = #{membership} WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET enable=#{enable} WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET pwd=#{pwd}, modify_date=SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.couponNum, coupon, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate, userId, useCoupon, CASE WHEN useCoupon=1 THEN '사용완료' WHEN endDate < SYSDATE THEN '기간만료' ELSE '미사용' END couponState FROM coupon c JOIN myCoupon mc ON c.couponNum = mc.couponNum WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT p.perfNum, subject, rating, time, saveFilename, userId, category FROM performance p JOIN choice c ON c.perfNum = p.perfNum JOIN poster ps ON p.perfnum = ps.perfnum JOIN genre g ON g.gnum = p.gmnum JOIN category ct ON ct.cnum = g.cnum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND ps.poster_main = 1
SELECT userId, perfNum FROM choice WHERE userId=#{userId} AND perfNum=#{perfNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM choice WHERE userId=#{userId} AND perfNum=#{perfNum}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(bookDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') bookDate, b.bNum, subject, perf_date, amount, state, TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(perf_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') cancel_date, LISTAGG(seat_num,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY seat_num) AS seat_num, t.name, t.location, h.hallName, h.hNum, po.saveFilename FROM book b JOIN book2 bo ON bo.bNum = b.bNum JOIN performanceTime pt ON pt.ptNum = b.ptNum JOIN schedule s ON s.perf_date = pt.perf_date JOIN performance p ON p.perfNum = s.perfNum2 JOIN theater t ON p.tNum = t.tNum JOIN hall h ON t.hallNo = h.hNum JOIN poster po ON p.perfNum = po.perfNum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND po.poster_main = 1 GROUP BY bookDate, b.bNum, subject, perf_date, amount, state, perf_date, t.name, t.location, h.hallName, h.hNum, po.saveFilename

SELECT bookDate, b.bNum, subject, perf_date, amount, state, TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(perf_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - 3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') cancel_date, LISTAGG(seat_num,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY seat_num) AS seat_num, t.name, t.location, h.hallName, h.hNum, po.saveFilename FROM book b JOIN book2 bo ON bo.bNum = b.bNum JOIN performanceTime pt ON pt.ptNum = b.ptNum JOIN schedule s ON s.perf_date = pt.perf_date JOIN performance p ON p.perfNum = s.perfNum2 JOIN theater t ON p.tNum = t.tNum JOIN hall h ON t.hallNo = h.hNum JOIN poster po ON p.perfNum = po.perfNum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND po.poster_main = 1 AND b.bNum = #{bNum} GROUP BY bookDate, b.bNum, subject, perf_date, amount, state, perf_date, t.name, t.location, h.hallName, h.hNum, po.saveFilename
